name: NEXUSHIP
description:
Control the Nexuship! Build your ship and fight enemies!

Try to reach 20000 if you can!! ψ(｀∇´)ψ

How To Play:

  • WASD ---- control the hook machine
  • Space --- launch or attach spaceship parts
  • Left-click --- choose hook machine to control
  • Right-click --- detach spaceship parts

Hook Machine

This part can grab up to 4 different parts

 Gun Part

Just BIG Gun (What are you expecting?  : - )

 Bullet Booster

This part can boost all the Gun Part under the same Hook Machine

  Shield

This part is rich in health!  You may want to use them wisely

 Bomb

Be careful! These evil things will try to link up with your ship and below it away! Detach it while you can!
